summary: You can now ride a rowboat on the water.
descriptionHtml:
You can now buy a rowboat in the Raven Rock for 500 gold and hop on it and travel on water. The boat cannot break and moving is the same controls as walking.Â To exit the boat simply jump, run, or sail and touch the shore. The boat will not port in the city unlike a horse that will be stables outside the city. You can download that optional if you wish. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1019/?]here[/url]. Also check out my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76240?]Skyrim Rowboat [/url]mod.

Requirements
Skyrim
Dragonborn

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
